Text.Page:
The sikandaris are keeping us far from the Temple of Sikander. If we're going to end this, we've got to punch through.

That means starting with the sikandari stalwarts. They want to die for their god? Let's oblige them.

Nice work. I don't know what possessed the sikandaris to side with Killian and Thulsa, but we've got to protect our own first. This is a good start.

There's more to do. Don't wait for me.
